AT.name: 3D Shinobi III
AT.description: Joe Musashis Erzfeinde, die Neo Zeed, sind zurück! An ihrer Spitze steht der Shadow Master, ein herausragender Ninja, der von Joes eigener Blutlinie geklont wurde. Das Syndikat hält die Stadt mit seinen kriminellen Aktivitäten in Atem. Nutze tödliche Waffen und all dein Ninja-Können, um den wilden Horden die Stirn zu bieten und deine Stadt zu befreien! Zusätzlich zur neuen Präsentation in 3D enthält 3D Shinobi III einen Rundenauswahlmodus sowie die Möglichkeit, jede Aktion einem bestimmten Knopf zuzuweisen.

AU.name: 3D Shinobi III
AU.description: Joe Musashi’s sworn enemies, the Neo Zeed, have returned! Controlled by Shadow Master, a formidable ninja cloned from Joe’s own bloodline, the syndicate holds the city captive with its vicious crime ring. Utilize deadly weapons and lethal ninja arts in order to stand against the hordes of bio-ninja and save your city! In addition to its all-new 3D presentation, 3D Shinobi III features a Round Select Mode and customizable input setting which allows you to assign each action to specific buttons.

BG.name: 3D Shinobi III
BG.description: Joe Musashi’s sworn enemies, the Neo Zeed, have returned! Controlled by Shadow Master, a formidable ninja cloned from Joe’s own bloodline, the syndicate holds the city captive with its vicious crime ring. Utilize deadly weapons and lethal ninja arts in order to stand against the hordes of bio-ninja and save your city! In addition to its all-new 3D presentation, 3D Shinobi III features a Round Select Mode and customizable input setting which allows you to assign each action to specific buttons.

BE.name: 3D Shinobi III
BE.description: Les Neo Zeed, les ennemis jurés de Joe Musashi, sont de retour ! Contrôlés par le Maître de l'Ombre, redoutable ninja cloné à partir du sang de Joe, les malfrats ont la main mise sur la ville grâce à leur réseau criminel. Utilise le ninjutsu et des armes meurtrières pour repousser les bio-ninjas et sauver ta ville ! En plus de sa toute nouvelle présentation en relief, 3D Shinobi III comporte un mode Sélection du tour et des paramètres de commandes personnalisables qui te permet d'assigner chaque action à un bouton spécifique.

ES.name: 3D Shinobi III
ES.description: ¡Los archienemigos de Joe Musashi, los Neo Zeed, han regresado! Controlado por Shadow Master, un ninja formidable, clonado a partir del mismo linaje que Joe, el sindicato mantiene a la ciudad cautiva con su malvado círculo criminal. ¡Utiliza armas letales y mortíferas artes ninja para enfrentarte a las hordas de bio-ninjas y salvar la ciudad! Además de sus nuevos gráficos en 3D, 3D Shinobi III contiene un modo de selección de rondas y una opción de control personalizable que te permiten asignar cada acción a botones específicos.

IT.name: 3D Shinobi III
IT.description: Gli acerrimi nemici di Joe Musashi, i Neo Zeed, sono tornati! L'organizzazione, controllata dallo Shadow Master, un ninja formidabile clonato dalla stirpe di Joe, tiene la città prigioniera attraverso la rete criminale. Usa armi distruttive e arti ninja letali per respingere le orde dei cloni ninja e salvare la città! Oltre ad essere completamente in 3D, 3D Shinobi III comprende la modalità Selezione round e la possibilità di personalizzare i comandi assegnando ogni azione a un pulsante specifico.

NO.description: Joe Musashi’s sworn enemies, the Neo Zeed, have returned! NL.name: 3D Shinobi III
NL.description: Joe Musashi’s gezworen vijanden, de Neo Zeed, zijn terug! Het misdadige syndicaat, dat wordt geleid door Shadow Master, een formidabele ninja die gekloond is uit Joes eigen bloedlijn, houdt de stad in zijn greep. Gebruik dodelijke wapens en ninja-acties om stand te houden tegen de ene na de andere golf bio-ninja's en red je stad! 3D Shinobi III kent niet alleen volledig nieuwe 3D-beelden, maar bevat ook een levelkeuzestand en de mogelijkheid om acties aan specifieke knoppen toe te wijzen.

NZ.name: 3D Shinobi III
NZ.description: Joe Musashi’s sworn enemies, the Neo Zeed, have returned! Controlled by Shadow Master, a formidable ninja cloned from Joe’s own bloodline, the syndicate holds the city captive with its vicious crime ring. Utilize deadly weapons and lethal ninja arts in order to stand against the hordes of bio-ninja and save your city! In addition to its all-new 3D presentation, 3D Shinobi III features a Round Select Mode and customizable input setting which allows you to assign each action to specific buttons.

PL.name: 3D Shinobi III
PL.description: Joe Musashi’s sworn enemies, the Neo Zeed, have returned! Controlled by Shadow Master, a formidable ninja cloned from Joe’s own bloodline, the syndicate holds the city captive with its vicious crime ring. Utilize deadly weapons and lethal ninja arts in order to stand against the hordes of bio-ninja and save your city! In addition to its all-new 3D presentation, 3D Shinobi III features a Round Select Mode and customizable input setting which allows you to assign each action to specific buttons.

PT.name: 3D Shinobi III
PT.description: Os arqui-inimigos de Joe Musashi, os Neo Zeed, regressaram! Controlado pelo Shadow Master, um ninja formidável clonado a partir do sangue do próprio Joe, este sindicato mantém a cidade refém com os seus métodos criminosos. Utiliza armas mortíferas e artes ninja letais para enfrentar as hordas de bio-ninjas e salvar a tua cidade! Para além da sua nova apresentação em 3D, o Shinobi III 3D inclui um modo Round Select (Seleção de Ronda) e controlos personalizáveis que permitem definir as ações atribuídas a cada botão.

RU.name: 3D Shinobi III
RU.description: Заклятые враги Джо Мусаси из организации Neo Zeed снова вышли на тропу войны! Этот преступный синдикат возглавляет грозный ниндзя Мастер Тень - клон одного из родственников Джо. Под его руководством Neo Zeed удалось захватить целый город. Используйте смертоносное оружие и беспощадные приемы ниндзюцу, чтобы справиться с полчищами враждебных ниндзя и освободить улицы! 3D-версия Shinobi III получила не только полностью трехмерный вид, но и режим выбора уровня, а также функцию настройки управления, позволяющую назначить каждое действие на удобную вам кнопку.

SE.name: 3D Shinobi III
SE.description: Joe Musashi’s sworn enemies, the Neo Zeed, have returned! Controlled by Shadow Master, a formidable ninja cloned from Joe’s own bloodline, the syndicate holds the city captive with its vicious crime ring. Utilize deadly weapons and lethal ninja arts in order to stand against the hordes of bio-ninja and save your city! In addition to its all-new 3D presentation, 3D Shinobi III features a Round Select Mode and customizable input setting which allows you to assign each action to specific buttons.
